35.long: all, the whole, every kind of.
an assembly, congregation, synagogue, either the place or the people gathered together in the place.

35.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
35.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
the good news of the coming of the Messiah, the gospel; the gen. after it expresses sometimes the giver (God), sometimes the subject (the Messiah, etc.), sometimes the human transmitter (an apostle).
kingship, sovereignty, authority, rule, especially of God, both in the world, and in the hearts of men; hence: kingdom, in the concrete sense.

35.brief: I care for, attend, serve, heal
35.long: I care for, attend, serve, treat, especially of a physician; hence: I heal.

35.brief: all, the whole, every kind of
35.long: all, the whole, every kind of.

35.long: all, the whole, every kind of.

36.long: I see, look upon, experience, perceive, discern, beware.

36.brief: but, on the other hand, and
36.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
a crowd, mob, the common people.
I feel compassion, have pity on, am moved.

36.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
36.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
that, since, because; may introduce direct discourse.
I throw, cast, toss, set down; pass: I am dispersed.

36.brief: as if, as it were, like, about
36.long: as if, as it were, like; with numbers: about.
a shepherd; hence met: of the feeder, protector, and ruler of a flock of men.

37.long: (denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

37.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
37.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
an untranslatable particle, generally answered by "de", each of the two introducing a clause intended to be contrasted with the other.
reaping, harvest; met: the harvest, crop.

37.brief: but, on the other hand, and
37.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
a field-laborer; then: a laborer, workman in general.
(a) especially in plur: few, (b) in sing: small; hence, of time: short, of degree: light, slight, little.

38.long: I want for myself; I want, need; I beg, request, beseech, pray.
reaping, harvest; met: the harvest, crop.

38.brief: how, in order that, so that
38.long: how, in order that, so that, that.

38.brief: I throw, cast, put out, banish, bring forth, produce
38.long: I throw (cast, put) out; I banish; I bring forth, produce.

into, in, unto, to, upon, towards, for, among.
